plot: South Africa's paramedics face a surge of violent crime and historic social change 15 years since the end of its oppressive Apartheid era.
title: Tell Me and I Will Forget
plot_es: South Africa's paramedics face a surge of violent crime and historic social change 15 years since the end of its oppressive Apartheid era.
original_name: Tell Me and I Will Forget
plot_en: South Africa's paramedics face a surge of violent crime and historic social change 15 years since the end of its oppressive Apartheid era.
